text: واجعل لى لسان صدق فى الءاخرين

translations.translation: and make me highly esteemed among the later peoples;
And uphold my name with posterity,
and grant me an honourable reputation among posterity,
Make my words come true in the future.
“And give me proper fame among the succeeding generations.”
And grant me an honorable mention in later generations.
And ordain for me a goodly mention among posterity
and appoint me a tongue of truthfulness among the others.
And give unto me a good report in later generations.
give me a good name among later generations;
And appoint for me an honourable mention among the posterity
Confer on me a worthy repute among the posterity,
Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);
And grant me an honourable mention in later generations;
And appoint me a tongue of truthfulness among the latter.
And give me a reputation of truth among the others.
And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
[26:84] And confer on me a worthy repute, excellent praise, among posterity, those who will come after me up to   the Day of Resurrection.
(And give unto me a good report) a good mention (in later generations) those who come after me.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَٱجْعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي ٱلآخِرِينَ } معناه الثَّناءُ الحَسِنُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱجْعَل لِّي } بفضلك وجودك { لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ } أي: لساناً يتكلم بالصدق في حِكمك وأحكامك، ومعارفك وحقائقك، وجميع أوامرك ونواهيك، بحيث يدوم أثر صدقي في أقوالي وأفعالي وأحوالي، وفي جميع أطواري وأخلاقي { فِي ٱلآخِرِينَ } [الشعراء: 84] أي: اللاحقين من عبادك؛ لذلك ما من دين من الأديان إلاَّ وله - صلوات الرحمن عليه وسلامه - فيه أقوال وأفعال وأخلاق منسوبة إليه، مسلمة منه، معمولة بمتابعته
